page.title: 13A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: On Saturdays my family gets up quite early, we get dressed and have breakfast. My mum runs a shop nearby and she opens at 8.00 am on a Saturday morning. While she's at the shop, my sister and I play on the computer for a while. At the weekend we all help to feed the animals. I feed the hens and ducks, my dad feeds the horses, Tina feeds the geese,and my mam feeds the dogs and the guinea pigs. When mam comes back from shop and before lunch, we go to the supermarket in Inverness and buy food for the weekend. Then we go home and after lunch watch T.V. or play football. My dad works on the croft in the afternoon and my mam opens the shop agein at 4.00 pm. In the evening we have dinner and watch T.V.
